title: A New England Nun - dominant element of meeting

content.question: The dominant element of Joe and Louisa's meeting (paragraph 2 sentence 4 - paragraph 9) is

choices.label: tactfulness on both of their parts
a growing sense of betrayal on Louisa's part

content.answer: tactfulness on both of their parts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
